amendment.description: To ensure that funds for research and development of electric grid energy storage are used efficiently.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2989 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2989 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Reed to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S420-421; text: CR S420) To ensure that funds for research and development of electric grid energy storage are used efficiently.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2989 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2989 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Reed to Amendment SA 2953.
